title: How to Make Rijstevlaai

steps.headline: Boil the milk with the salt.
Rinse the rice and add the vanilla sugar to the milk.
Boil the mixture on a low fire for about 30 minutes.
Separate the egg.
steps.description: Stir the egg yolk loose and add the sugar. Whip the egg white.

steps.headline: Take the mixture of the fire and add spoon per spoon of the egg yolk to the mixture and mix carefully.
steps.description: Fold the egg white  slowly in the mixture afterwards.

steps.headline: Butter a pie shape of about 28 a 30 centimeter (11.8 in).
Add the (sifted) flour and add the butter cubes, add the baking powder and the salt.
Knead the dough until it's elastic.
steps.description: Dust your working space with flour and roll the dough out until a circle shape that is a bit bigger than the pie shape.

steps.headline: Dust the dough with some flour and place it in the pie shape.
steps.description: Add the rice/milk mixture and let it bake for about 40 minutes in the oven until it's golden brown.

steps.headline: Let the pie cool down for about 30 minutes in the shape.
Cut the sides carefully loose with a knife, take the pie out of the shape and let it cool for a while.
Serve with whipped cream when desired.

text: Boil the milk with the salt.  Rinse the rice and add the vanilla sugar to the milk.  Boil the mixture on a low fire for about 30 minutes.  Separate the egg. Stir the egg yolk loose and add the sugar. Whip the egg white. Take the mixture of the fire and add spoon per spoon of the egg yolk to the mixture and mix carefully. Fold the egg white  slowly in the mixture afterwards. Butter a pie shape of about 28 a 30 centimeter (11.8 in).  Add the (sifted) flour and add the butter cubes, add the baking powder and the salt.  Knead the dough until it's elastic. Dust your working space with flour and roll the dough out until a circle shape that is a bit bigger than the pie shape. Pre-heat the oven on 200 °C (392 °F) .  Dust the dough with some flour and place it in the pie shape. Add the rice/milk mixture and let it bake for about 40 minutes in the oven until it's golden brown. Let the pie cool down for about 30 minutes in the shape.  Cut the sides carefully loose with a knife, take the pie out of the shape and let it cool for a while.  Serve with whipped cream when desired.
